user_query: I want to surprise my family with a keto-friendly picnic. Please suggest some keto recipes with carbohydrates less than 100 grams and more than 5 grams. Also, fetch the KFC restaurants near me and provide me with the nutritional information of milk. Thanks!

TaskList.description: Retrieve keto-friendly recipes that have carbohydrate content between 5 to 100 grams.
Fetch the list of KFC restaurants near the user's location.
